question: Which country's women cricket team has clinched the Asia Cup Twenty-20 tournament 2018?
explanation: In Women\'s Cricket, Bangladesh team has won the Asia Cup Twenty-20 tournament by defeating India in the final by 7 wickets at Kuala Lumpur on June 10, 2018. India have won six titles since the tournament\'s inception in 2004, while for Bangladesh, this was their first title.
